alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 09 at 9:33AM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall and high tides is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Broward and Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 931 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Heavy rain combined with high tides will lead to urban and small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain combined with poor drainage and high tides will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hollywood, Hallandale, Aventura, Dania Beach and Golden Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
